                                                                               boolean allownvmsvc)
        retrieve a volatile memory allocator service
        Parameters:
        id - specify a name of allocator to retrieve
        allownvmsvc - specify whether allow to treat non-volatile memory allocator as volatile one during searching

        the volatile memory allocator service instance
